lead_paragraph: The announcement, made in the first transition conference call with reporters, was an attempt to make good on Mr. Trump’s promise to “drain the swamp” in Washington.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and ERIC LIPTON

headline.print_headline: Trump Team Sets Limits on Lobbying by Ex-Staff
headline.main: Trump Team Sets Broader Limits on Lobbying by Former Staff

snippet: The announcement, made in the first transition conference call with reporters, was an attempt to make good on Mr. Trump’s promise to “drain the swamp” in Washington....
abstract: Spokesman for Donald J Trump announces transition team will not include lobbyists, and administration members will be barred from lobbying five years after leaving government.
